ComicInfo.Title: Salesman of Death; Requiem; Witch's Wish; Trapped from the Grave; The Secret One; Facts on the Fantastic; The Phantom Ship
ComicInfo.Summary:
Salesman of Death: An employee's ghost haunts his cruel boss. The dead salesman tries to sell his former employer on death. He kills the man's wife, destroys his factory, makes him a cripple and succeeds in the end.
Requiem: Summary of Mozart's being commissioned by a mystery man to compose his famous "Requiem" and dying in the process.
Witch's Wish: Young Madlyn discovers that her wishes become true. It is the spirit of Tess, a 300-year-old witch, who wants to take over the woman's body, though. A duel ensues, in which both women lose their lives.
Trapped from the Grave: Ghost of a murdered man leads his friends to his unknown grave.
The Secret One: Old man Harvey summons a demon, the "Secret One". After fulfilling Harvey's fantasies of revenge, the demon demands food - and goes after his new master.
Facts on the Fantastic: Allegedly true facts of how the people of the world deal with ghosts.
The Phantom Ship: The vicious sorceress Circe lures treasure hunters aboard her gold-filled phantom ship - and transforms them into giant rats.
